title: What is the name of the science that studies our planet? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many sciences that study the planet, there are grouped together under the term earth sciences. They include geology, oceanography, geology, meteorology, vulcanology  and also life sciences such as agriculture, botany etcIt is a very long list detailed in the Wikipedia page below.http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earth_science

There is no such thing as study of whole earth, every form of science attempts at studying a part of earth like neurology (study of neurons), pedology (study of soil), etc but if want to study earth as a whole, you have to study everything,which is close to impossible for a human with limited lifespan .
Earth science. The topics convey that pretty well, I might add.
Geology would be a good part of it
